title: Sirius Konsum - script
content:
Does anyone know what type is used for this?  
Looks familiar but I can't seem to figure it out.

Sirius Konsum as well as Orange.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [ScriptType.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20131022054759/http:/typophile.com/files/ScriptType.png) | 10.13 KB |
author: AnalogSystm

comments.content:
I have been unable to locate anything that even matches the K. Sirius Konsum appears to be too consistent for me to say that it's hand-drawn with any certainty, although I suppose it's possible. I have looked in almost every book I have, including pre-digital, without finding anything even particularly close.

For lack of any clues, I'd have to guess 'custom'.

- Mike Yanega
My thoughts as well -- I find the technical quality of the character shapes to be a little below par, especially the capitals. I trust your judgement.
